Question: This person was as enthusiastic about his family as he was about his work.
Hints: Later given the honour of naming the newly discovered species, he named it this person's turtle (Elseya irwini) after his family.
In 2006, this person provided his voice for the 2006 animated film Happy Feet, as an elephant seal named Trev.
This person also supported rugby union, being a fan of the national team, the Wallabies.
